Dear ##SM_RULE_360 Email Salutation##,

Mark your calendar for our upcoming online board meeting this Thursday. The meeting is open to all ACLU of Mississippi members. If you have joined the ACLU as a member or renewed your membership in the past 12 months, we want you to join us!

Please join us on Zoom this Thursday, November 15 at 12 p.m. to learn the outcome of the 2018 board of directors election, receive the State of the Affiliate report, and get an update on our initiatives for the next year.

There are several different ways to join:

  • Join from PC, Mac, Linux, iOS or Android: https://zoom.us/j/435467061.
  • Join us by iPhone one-tap: US: +1-408-638-0968, 435467061# or +1-646-876-9923, 435467061#.
  • By Telephone, dial: +1-408-638-0968 or +1-646-876-9923 or +1-669-900-6833.
  • Use Meeting ID: 435 467 061.
  • International numbers at available: https://zoom.us/u/abG8LcPy3d.

We would be unable to do our work without the steadfast support of our members. Your voice and your vote matter.

Thank you for your support.

Jennifer Riley-Collins
Executive Director, ACLU of Mississippi
